website_summaries.verdict: Reasonably priced product that has a large capacity.
pros: Works on brake systems for all types of motorized vehicles, but also can clean machines and tools
Uses a non-chlorine formula to allow for use in many locations
Works equally well for removing dirt and oil from metal, especially aluminum
cons: Spray nozzle seems to empty the can more quickly than some other brake cleaners

customer_reviews.title: It sprays, and it cleans.
customer_reviews.text: I used this stuff on my last brake job and man does it come out of the can fast. I was told to get at least two or three cans to use for all four corners of the car. I thought I can use it sparingly and I got one can. I got one and a half calipers mostly clean before the can was gone. It cleaned well, I think, for a spray on / wipe off situation. So I will give it four stars because it did clean and it did spray.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product yet a little pricey.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason for 4 stars is that it is a bit pricey. You can get brake and parts cleaner locally at an automotive store for about $5. Having said that, it works beautifully on brake parts and cleaning unwanted paint and tar on your wheels. Use judiciously around rubber. Not to fear getting it on rubber parts but I wouldn't coat a rubber part with it and try to use that as a cleaner. Precautions are listed on the can. Invaluable tool for a brake job and cleaning. Recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: DanoTop Contributor: Bob Dylan

customer_reviews.title: I guess it is this more eco-friendly formula that makes it not dry almost instantly like the old brake part cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I guess it is this more eco-friendly formula that makes it not dry almost instantly like the old brake part cleaner. Had to use a rag to clean up this stuff if you blast away like I have always done with brake part cleaner in the past. Not a bad thing but caught me off guard without a rag nearby to get it up before the drips stained the concrete.
customer_reviews.author: VTSnoop

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This product cleans more than just brake parts, it's good for other metal surfaces such as prior to using Permatex gasket maker.
customer_reviews.author: Art Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Performs very well. Not just for brakes.
customer_reviews.text: It has all sorts of cleaning applications for your shop. I recently used it for cleaning the bottom of my very old (40 years) heating oil tank to make visible a hard to find very slow sludge oil molasses type leak to show my tank insurance guy that the oil tank is toast and needs replacement.
customer_reviews.author: George W Travers

customer_reviews.title: The Clean Way to Go
customer_reviews.text: I needed to clean my brake calipers before painted them and this worked great! I needed something non-chlorinated based on my car's service manual and this fit the bill. Spray on and it knocked off a lot of the big stuff and then re-application cleans great with a very fast dry time (seconds) to get the rest. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Furman O. Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Works well for cleaning brake dust, grime, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for cleaning brake dust, grime, and any other crud you want to remove without leaving much residue or stripping clear coat instantly.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Good price, works well.
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy Brakleen at the local parts store, but I needed a bunch of it recently, and the price here is better. Since it's made by Permatex, I wasn't surprised that it is just as good. The spray nozzle even seems a little better, since it is larger and I think holds the straw better. Also, this contains about 50% acetone, which means it can melt/cloud some paints and plastics, so be careful with the over-spray.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: This Non-Chlorinated brake & parts cleaner with no order is great!
customer_reviews.text: Much better then the previous purchase. My first order must have been chlorinated and the smell was so strong it made me sick, using outdoors. This new order Non-Chlorinated cleaner does not smell or make me sick, Very pleased with this product. Be sure to buy Non-Chlorinated.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fahey

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned my new rotors perfectly for installation!
customer_reviews.text: This brake cleaner is easy to use and doesn't produce too much mist when spraying my rotors off before installation. It evaporates quickly, so make sure to work efficiently and fast so as not to let it wear off before you work on the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to remove some oil stains on my concrete driveway. Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: g9782

customer_reviews.title: Great brake cleaner would buy again !
customer_reviews.text: Great brake cleaner which I used for my Honda brake job. Cleaned all 4 sets of brakes very well before installing new rotors and brake pads and had some remaining for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: used this product hundred of times. The last 3 can purchased, all were defectiv. Leaked out from the nozzle / port. . black crude around all 3 cans. Great until you depress the nozzle, then the problem begins and ends...
customer_reviews.author: PHIL

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several kinds of brake cleaner, but this one is my favorite. The oder is very low and it cleans great. I use a full can per axel, so make sure you buy enough to do a the full job.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning new rotors!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cleaning my new rotors prior to installation! Brakes worked well immediately after instalation.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good brake cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Way to go if you need to clean brake rotors and other brake parts.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Drake

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: cleans well. Only enough for one job if the rotors are coated with protectant
customer_reviews.author: DROCK

customer_reviews.title: Ordering my second case!
customer_reviews.text: I've traditionally used CRC brake cleaner, but it was getting expensive. I tried 3M, but did not find it to be comparable. The Permatex product provides the quality I was used to with CRC at a better price. Just ordered my second case!
customer_reviews.author: bamnow

customer_reviews.title: A must for any brake job...
customer_reviews.text: If you're doing a brake job, you'll need this stuff. Works great at removing all dirt and oil, dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Brett G.

customer_reviews.title: obviously great for gasket surface prep
customer_reviews.text: makes things clean and dry QUICK... obviously great for gasket surface prep... get you some..
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: nice brake cleaner
customer_reviews.text: some cleaners linger around, some leaves tacky crap as they dry, some stink up my garage for hours, but I found that these permatex cleaners get the job done without all these negatives. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JoH

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. Got my parts clean in a flash. No residue on the cleaned parts. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo

customer_reviews.title: right product at the right price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great national brand break cleaner. I purchase it by the case from amazon and with prime if comes to my door with free shipping. Break cleaner is one of those things you should always have a few cans on hand for general parts cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Todd & Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Did a great
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my doing changing my rotors manually. Did a great job
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great product, low odor and less less aggressive on work environment than other products, but still cleans well.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, low odor and less less aggressive on work environment than other products, but still cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Value Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have in case I need to clean any ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't yet used it. Nice to have in case I need to clean any tools or car parts.
customer_reviews.author: Al K Seltzer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, buy more than one they go fast!
customer_reviews.author: Callawaystu

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Fast way to clean brakes and rotors. Blasted out crude and dirt on affected parts, plenty to do all four rotors. I would highly recommend these item.
customer_reviews.author: Love is all I have

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works well to clean brake parts and leaves no residue. That's all I can ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tough Cleans
customer_reviews.text: I used this to clean the coil springs, chains, and runner tracks on my overhead doors in my horse barn, and it worked very well on a variety of surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Butterworth

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best ?
customer_reviews.text: Not the best I have used. Can seems to empty fast and doesn't cut grime like others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: harry

customer_reviews.title: Cleans my parts
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it's supposed to do without a nasty smell. Works well when I was cleaning some of my underbody parts and brake and clutch reservoirs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lam

customer_reviews.title: like that it's less toxic
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Smell is minimal. like that it's less toxic. I bought a case and saved a lot of money that way.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely priced and I couldn't be happier with the way it works.
customer_reviews.author: Selvin Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Spray
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find this in the stores so I looked on line great product for what I use it for not automobles
customer_reviews.author: Jerber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It cleans nicely and doesn't gas me out of a room
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bartsch

customer_reviews.title: Good product for use outdoors in open air
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner for parts and brakes, Just be sure to use in a open fresh air area, has very strong oder.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fahey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it cleans everything off your brake parts with a simple spray
customer_reviews.author: Dale P. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Permatex 82450 Non-Chlorinated Brake and Parts Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Permatex is always my top number one brand for car maintenance products! This cleaner comes with a small red pinpoint nozzle straw attachment. This brake & parts cleaner is significantly better than most cleaners because of the almost non-existent smell (you should still practice proper ventilation and eye wear). This cleaner sprays fairly rough so you can blast some loose residue and evaporates fairly quickly. It also doesn't leave a tacky residue like some previous off-brand cleaners I have used. Get this cleaner and not any other!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Best value!
customer_reviews.text: As a car restoration hobbyist, I frequently use a parts cleaner, but also need spray products for those parts still on a car. I used to buy CRC Products, but they have become too pricey. Permatex Brake and Parts Cleaner performs as good or better than CRC products and costs nearly 50% less per can (when purchased by the case) than comparable products purchased at the local auto parts store. As long as they keep this price and quality level, Permatex will remain my first choice.
customer_reviews.author: bamnow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product to clean your brake caliper when doing your DIY maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Les.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is not the best but is working for some cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Jenya Grant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job cleaning the brake parts prior to reassembly.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well. Dried fast. Will be ordering more for future projects.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: A Safer Brake Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is the first brake and parts cleaner we have found that is not banned in any of the states in the USA. If California allows this product it must be safer for our mechanics! It does the job and less toxic to inhale, we made the switch. Our company take pride in our concern for the environment and our employees' health and safety. Georgia's rules are much more laxed. We follow CA. guidelines for the most part. Price is much better than local suppliers. Of course quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: Parachute

customer_reviews.title: permatex always works great.
customer_reviews.text: cleaner did great, i always trust permatex for my automotive fluids/pastes/compounds. can has plenty of spray velocity.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

product_meta.title: Permatex 82450 Non-Chlorinated Brake and Parts Cleaner, 14.5 oz.
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1| Style:14.5 oz.Permatex Non-Chlorinated Brake & Parts Cleaner penetrates, dissolves and removes dirt and oil from brake systems and metal parts. Safer for aluminum and leaves no contaminant-attracting residue or chlorinated solvent run-off. Helps manage EPA halide limits. This cleaner is for use on all brake systems, C.V. joints, machinery, tools, and farm equipment.
feature_bullets: Penetrates, dissolves and removes dirt and oil from brake systems and metal parts
Safer for aluminum; helps manage EPA halide limits
Leaves no contaminant-attracting residue or chlorinated solvent run-off
Can be applied without disassembling the brake unit since Brake & Parts Cleaner will penetrate to clean
Suggested Applications: All brake systems, C.V. joints, machinery, tools, and farm equipment

specifications.Vehicle Service Type: Street-touring-motorcycles, Street-sport-motorcycles, Marine-personal-craft, Off-road-motorcycles, Street-cruiser-motorcycles, Snowmobiles, Utility-vehicles, All-terrain-vehicles, Street-motor-scooters
